name: unbrushed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unbrushed hair has not been made smooth with a hairbrush: Her blonde hair looked unbrushed, and she was wearing a scruffy old T-shirt.
Unbrushed teeth have not been cleaned with a toothbrush: I was still in my pajamas with my teeth unbrushed. See also
brush verb (CLEAN)
More examplesFewer examplesOne staff member had long, unbrushed hair, which looked untidy. I sit at home with my unbrushed hair and cup of tea. You would never see her with her hair unbrushed or her nails unpolished.Too late, she remembered her unbrushed teeth.
